metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29962 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Firefox for Android would become unstable and hard-to-recover when awebsite opened too many popups. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android.Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 89.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
